content:
AG Jeans usually offers some amazing deals during Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales. In previous years, they've offered discounts ranging from 20% to 40% off select styles, including their high-waisted jeans.

Here are some tips to help you snag a deal on AG Jeans during Black Friday and Cyber Monday:

1. **Sign up for their email newsletter**: AG Jeans often sends exclusive promo codes and early access to sales to their subscribers. Make sure you're on their list to get the inside scoop.
2. **Follow them on social media**: AG Jeans often announces special promotions and flash sales on their social media channels, so keep an eye on their Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter accounts.
3. **Check their website**: AG Jeans usually has a dedicated Black Friday and Cyber Monday sale page on their website, featuring discounted prices on select styles.
4. **Look for bundle deals**: AG Jeans sometimes offers bundle deals, where you can buy multiple items together at a discounted price. This can be a great way to stock up on your favorite styles or try out new ones.
5. **Use promo codes**: Keep an eye out for promo codes and discount codes that can be used during the Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales. You can check websites like RetailMeNot or Coupons.com for valid codes.
6. **Shop during off-peak hours**: If you can, try shopping during off-peak hours (like early morning or late evening) to avoid site traffic and ensure a smoother shopping experience.

Some popular promo codes to look out for during Black Friday and Cyber Monday include:

* 20% off all orders (AGJEANS20)
* 30% off select styles (AGSELECT30)
* Buy one, get one 50% off (BOGO50)
* Free shipping on all orders (FREESHIP)

Keep in mind that promo codes and discounts may vary from year to year, so be sure to check AG Jeans' website and social media for the most up-to-date information.

Good luck, and happy shopping!
